frameDefinitions: This frame contains transparent nouns (and some adjectives) denoting quantities of a Mass or of Individuals.
An Entity is rated as unexpected for its context in terms of its magnitude.
An Agent sets down in permanent form information about the occurrence of a Phenomenon.
The absolute Value of a quantifiable Attribute  of an item is determined by adding up the values for the Attribute of the individuals or parts that make up the item.
A Whole, an entity with a substructure, is assessed for whether or not it has all the necessary parts that are defined for it or for an entity of its kind.
A Cognizer computes a Result on the basis of input Numbers by addition.   '
frameExamples: He found them in the <t>deluge</t> of papers on his desk.
The <t>entire</t> apple was riddled with worms .
While visiting in Port Alberni, the day before he was diagnosed, we <t>recorded</t> him to have 14 drinks and go to the bathroom 10 times.
Defence is provided in West Germany by armed forces whose number <t>totals</t> close to half a million men and women
What happens after the PPB investigation is <t>complete</t>?
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Quantity</fen>-denoting <t>Target</t> word.
A substance that is being quantified.
A collection of entities.
The item which is described in terms of its expectedness in the context.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the sentient entity that creates a permanent record of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The <fen>Phenomenon</fen> is the entity or situation in the world of which a <fen>Agent</fen> becomes aware.
That feature of the <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.
The <fen>Value</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen> that is recorded for the specified <fen>Attribute</fen>.
An <fen>Entity</fen> for which the <fen>Agent</fen> records the <fen>Value</fen> of an <fen>Attribute</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> creates the record of the <fen>Phenomenon</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Agent</fen> sets down the facts.
The value of an attribute.
The scalar property of a concrete or abstract entity.
A set of numbers that add up to the <fen>Value</fen>.
The entity that is being assessed for having all its necessary parts or not.
The interval of time when the completeness of the entity is assessed.
The person doing the calculation.
The <fen>Numbers</fen> that are used in the calculation.
The outcome of the <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s calculcations.
The time at which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> operates on the <fen>Numbers</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> performs their calculation
listRoleExamples: A modicum <fex>of seepage on the floor</fex> is to be expected.
A number <fex>of concerned citizens</fex> have raised objections.
The entire <fex>day</fex> was spent on the project .
Police informed Mr Wong that <fex>they</fex> recorded the attack as a racial incident.
Adams took some very good advice and meticulously recorded <fex>the events that ensued</fex>.

When Mohammed was sentenced to death in the Anti-Terrorism Court in Rawalpindi
the court recorded <fex>his age</fex> as  17 or 18.

In the fiscal year 2000, Nepal's imports from China and Tibet were recorded <fex>at
166.6 million dollars</fex>.
At the time the Army recorded <fex>him</fex> as a married resident of the Town of Two Creeks.
From what the book says, these events were recorded <fex>in the Chamber of Mazarbul</fex> .
During the first three years of drug squad work, <fex>arrests</fex> totaled some sixty-four persons.
Look, you turn those into numbers, and then <fex>592 and 74</fex> total 666, right?
<fex>Our list of participants</fex> is still incomplete.
My journey to the dark side is <fex>now</fex> complete.
